title: Input schema for the youtube-search-scraper actor

maxResults.title: Maximum search results
maxResults.description:
Limit number of videos to crawl;
for 'No limits' empty the field

startUrls.title: Direct URLs
startUrls.description: Provide some direct Youtube urls, like channel urls or search urls. When provided, it disables search.

simplifiedInformation.title: Get simplified information from a channel
simplifiedInformation.description: If set to true, we will only get basic video information from the channel. You have to provide a channel Url as StartUrl

maxComments.title: Max comments
maxComments.description: Limit the number of comments that will get scraped. Scraping comments requires scrolling and takes time. 0 or empty means we will not scrape any comments at all.
maxComments.sectionDescription: Use this if you want to download comments and / or video subtitles as well.

downloadSubtitles.title: Download subtitles
downloadSubtitles.description: If set to true, we will also download subtitles for given video and convert it to SRT format

saveSubsToKVS.title: Save downloaded subtitles to Key Value Store
saveSubsToKVS.description: If set to true, we will save downloaded (and converted to .srt format) subtitles to Key Value Store in format { subtitles: srt_text }. 'downloadSubtitles' must be set to true for this take an effect

subtitlesLanguage.title: Download subtitles in selected language
subtitlesLanguage.description: Language to download subtitles in. 'downloadSubtitles' must be set to true for this take an effect

preferAutoGeneratedSubtitles.title: Prefer automatically generated subtitles before the user generated ones.
preferAutoGeneratedSubtitles.description: If set to `true` and language is provided, we download automatically generated subtitles rather then user ones. If no language is provided, this settings takes no effect

extendOutputFunction.title: Extend Output Function
extendOutputFunction.description: Add or remove properties on the output object or omit the output returning null
extendOutputFunction.sectionDescription: You can change the output of the items for your dataset here, or add additional behavior for

extendScraperFunction.title: Extend Scraper Function
extendScraperFunction.description: Advanced function that allows you to extend the default scraper functionality, allowing you to manually perform actions on the page
extendScraperFunction.prefill:
async ({ page, request, requestQueue, customData, Apify, extendOutputFunction }) => {
 
}

customData.title: Custom data
customData.description: Any data that you want to have available inside the Extend Output/Scraper Function

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: The best option is usually Automatic proxy. But you can also use your own proxies or no proxy

verboseLog.title: Verbose log
verboseLog.description: If set to true, we will save downloaded (and converted to .srt format) subtitles to Key Value Store in format { subtitles: srt_text, language: languageCode, type:autoOrUserGenerated }. 'downloadSubtitles' must be set to true for this take an effect
